hddy2000@qq.com

The realm of Fargodia, a time long from now.

The ancient ritual of Butterfly Summoning has awakened the once-dormant providence.

King Verlenbair, now fully transformed into a spectral figure, stands poised at the crossroads of fate.

Behind him a silent battle brews, with an archenemy arriving from the depths of dreams.

The laments and hopes of past worlds signal both redemption and judgment, with each butterfly flutter heralding either a new dawn or the shadow of apocalypses.

Will this be the start of a new saga, or the revelation of something deeper? As destinies intertwine, the story shall be unfolded.

Based on traditional box-garden level exploration and combat experience, Butterfly Dream integrates Chinese philosophy and aesthetic thinking. It is a small-scale souls-like game of retro style.

[Retro-style box level]

"All phases are illusory"

Go into strange dreams, explore dark medieval castles, and immerse yourself in the mysterious atmosphere of Gothic.

Step into a dangerous world and crack the intricate map of the courtyards.

Find a variety of weapons and props to overcome the powerful monsters that hinder you.

[classic fragmented narrative]

"There was once a man who dreamed that he had become a butterfly"

Take the dialogue of characters and the collection of props as clues to piece together the truth of dreams in confusion.

Experience the amplification and distortion of desire, and feel the struggle of people to become monsters.

[High-degree-of-freedom combat]

"Wash us with your precious blood and forgive us all our sins"

Confront the enemy of darkness and corrosion, and awaken the power of silence.

Unique weapons and equipment, a variety of fighting methods derived from "butterfly blade", choose the fighting style you are good at.

Combining the mechanism of traditional soul-fighting, such as rebound and gun-fighting, and changing coping strategies, it will bring you a hearty fighting experience.

content_descriptors.notes: There are some bloods during combat.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 20X
  • DirectX: Version 11

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7 or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 40X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: What is the experience of mixing Chinese Taoism philosophy into a Dark Horror Middle-age world? Do you want to do gun parry like Bloodborne in PC? You will find it all in Butterfly Dream, an old-fashioned Souls-like game.

English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
